CustomField.formula:
IF( Offert__c = true, (UnitPrice__c * Quantity__c / IF(TEXT( PricingModel__c ) == "CPM", 1000,1) * 6.6666667),
IF(
OR( AND( Bundlecheckbox__c = true, (INCLUDES( Type__c , "Frais technique") || INCLUDES( Type__c , "Frais technique push SMS")) ) , AND( NOT(INCLUDES( Type__c , "Frais technique")), NOT(INCLUDES( Type__c , "Frais technique push SMS")) ) ), Total__c * 6.6666667, Total__c ) )
CustomField.label: Prix Brut â‚¬ HT
